title: My 'Show Updates' and 'My Profile' don't work...
body:
I've tried reloging, but I always end up at Gragas' 'ups it broke'.  
It's getting pretty annoying since I have to check my feedback manually...

replies.body: Hey there, we are aware of this issue and are looking into it right now! We hope to have a fix for you (and everyone affected by this) soon!
